channel.title: SigNoz
channel.description: SigNoz is an open-source observability tool powered by OpenTelemetry. Get APM, logs, traces, metrics, exceptions, & alerts in a single tool.

item.title: AWS ECS Monitoring | Breaking out of the observability vendor lock-in with SigNoz
item.description: In this article I’d like to take you through the architecture and the process through which we leverage the container orchestration capabilities of AWS ECS without depending on AWS for logging, distributed tracing, metrics, alerts, and visualizations...
item.author: hello@signoz.io (SigNoz Inc)

item.title: CI/CD Observability Powered by OpenTelemetry
item.description: Track and analyze every stage of your CI/CD pipeline with OpenTelemetry and SigNoz to identify bottlenecks, improve reliability, and accelerate software delivery.
item.author: hello@signoz.io (SigNoz Inc)

item.title: Measuring the time between spans in an OpenTelemetry trace with a Clickhouse query
item.description: Sharing a query that lets you compare the time between two spans in different traces, even across two different services.
item.author: hello@signoz.io (SigNoz Inc)

item.title: Deep Temporal Observability - Correlate Metrics with Logs & Traces
item.description: Correlate Temporal workflow metrics, logs, and traces in SigNoz to quickly identify slow activities, pinpoint workflow failures, and debug issues with full context. No manual data stitching required.
item.author: hello@signoz.io (SigNoz Inc)

item.title: Deeper Trace Analytics - Analyze Root & Entry Spans with Ease
item.description: With our latest Deeper Trace Analytics update, SigNoz now enables powerful filtering for root and entry spans—making it significantly easier to analyze and debug distributed traces.
item.author: hello@signoz.io (SigNoz Inc)

item.title: Diving in to OpenTelemetry data with our new Trace and Logs Explorer
item.description: The team at SigNoz would like to share recent developments released this month that greatly enhance the ability to dynamically query your trace and log data. With these tools anyone can explore complex OpenTelemetry data and gain insight into their stack.
item.author: hello@signoz.io (SigNoz Inc)

item.title: Engineering a Trace Details Page That Handles a Million Spans
item.description: How do we load and debug traces of any size in a browser tab? In this blog, we’ll break down the techniques that enable seamless loading and analysis of any trace irrespective of its size - even if it comes with a million spans.
item.author: hello@signoz.io (SigNoz Inc)

item.title: Logs Search & Filter - Taking Quick Analysis of Logs to the Next Level
item.description: Searching and filtering for logs to debug issues is one of the top critical workflows any developer uses. We have gathered feedback from our users and shipped some important features that focus on speeding up log searches, refining the filtering process, and enhancing the overall log analysis experience.
item.author: hello@signoz.io (SigNoz Inc)

item.title: Insights into SigNoz’s Latest Features - A Conversation with Ankit, CTO of SigNoz
item.description: We sat down with Ankit, CTO and co-founder at SigNoz to get his insights on the product’s developments and what's on the horizon. He shared valuable perspectives on how SigNoz is enhancing the user experience, focusing on customer feedback, and building new features.
item.author: hello@signoz.io (SigNoz Inc)

item.title: Introducing Alerts History and Scheduled Maintenance - Enhancing Alert Management in SigNoz
item.description: Whenever an alert is triggered, developers want to examine its history. By offering a comprehensive view of past alerts, the Alerts History feature allows teams to identify patterns, understand key contributors to alerts, and make informed decisions about how to resolve issues more efficiently.
item.author: hello@signoz.io (SigNoz Inc)

item.title: Introducing Anomaly Detection - Smarter Alerts for Dynamic Metrics
item.description: Anomaly Detection will enable users to create smarter alerts based on dynamic metrics, moving beyond traditional fixed-threshold alerts. By detecting deviations from expected patterns, Anomaly Detection will help you stay informed about critical issues without getting overwhelmed by irrelevant alerts.
item.author: hello@signoz.io (SigNoz Inc)

item.title: Introducing Correlation - Bringing Infra/APM Metrics and Logs Together in SigNoz
item.description: With SigNoz, you can monitor logs, metrics, and traces under a single pane of glass. We've enhanced the ability to correlate signals by linking infrastructure metrics with logs and logs with APM metrics, helping you resolve issues more efficiently.
item.author: hello@signoz.io (SigNoz Inc)

item.title: Introducing Ingest Guard - A Game-Changer for Observability Cost Control
item.description: Ingest Guard is a feature that will help platform and finops teams have granular control on data ingestion and observability costs. This new addition to our platform is designed to enhance security, provide better cost control, and offer a streamlined approach to managing observability data.
item.author: hello@signoz.io (SigNoz Inc)

item.title: SigNoz Launch Week 4.0 - OpenTelemetry Powered Innovations That Redefine Observability
item.description: SigNoz Launch Week 4.0 introduces five new OpenTelemetry observability features with unified, real-time insights.
item.author: hello@signoz.io (SigNoz Inc)

item.title: Launching SigNoz Single Binary for Super Easy Open-Source Installation & Maintenance
item.description: The new SigNoz Single Binary simplifies installation and maintenance for self-hosted users by consolidating multiple components into one. With fewer moving parts, teams can focus on monitoring and optimizing their applications without operational complexity…
item.author: hello@signoz.io (SigNoz Inc)

item.title: Metrics Explorer - Search, Query, and Analyze all your Metrics at one place
item.description: Effortlessly search, analyze, and troubleshoot all your metrics in one place with Metrics Explorer. Instantly view what's being ingested, debug issues, and optimize your observability pipeline-no dashboards required.
item.author: hello@signoz.io (SigNoz Inc)

item.title: Native AWS Integrations with AutoDiscovery
item.description: With AWS Integrations, SigNoz eliminates the toil and complexity involved in setting up the plumbing for extracting telemetry from Cloudwatch.
item.author: hello@signoz.io (SigNoz Inc)

item.title: OpenTelemetry-Powered Infrastructure Monitoring
item.description: With our latest OpenTelemetry-powered Infra Monitoring, we bring you a native OpenTelemetry experience that seamlessly integrates infrastructure metrics with application performance data.
item.author: hello@signoz.io (SigNoz Inc)

item.title: Out-of-box OpenTelemetry-powered Kafka & Celery monitoring
item.description: With OpenTelemetry-powered Kafka & Celery monitoring, SigNoz introduces the industry's first fully integrated observability solution for messaging queues powered by OpenTelemetry.
item.author: hello@signoz.io (SigNoz Inc)

item.title: 9x more value for money than Datadog - SigNoz
item.description: SigNoz can provide up to 9x more value for money versus Datadog. Datadog pricing is complex, and often unpredictable. With SigNoz, your engineering team can do more while saving money simultaneously...
item.author: hello@signoz.io (SigNoz Inc)

item.title: How are RED metrics calculated in SigNoz | SigNoz Office Hours
item.description: Welcome to SigNoz office hours! In this series, one of our team members gives a presentation about a topic of their choice. This talk is presented by Srikanth Chekuri, backend engineer at SigNoz. He talks about how RED metrics are calculated in SigNoz...
item.author: hello@signoz.io (SigNoz Inc)

item.title: Self-hosting software & why it may be worth considering again now
item.description: With changing privacy laws, it's getting riskier to send your data to third party SaaS vendors. In the observability domain, traces and logs are something which you don't want to send outside. Let's find out why self-hosted software solutions are replacing SaaS providers now.
item.author: hello@signoz.io (SigNoz Inc)

item.title: SigNoz is now SOC2 Type 2 and HIPAA Compliant
item.description: We’re thrilled to announce that SigNoz is now SOC 2 Type II and HIPAA compliant.
item.author: hello@signoz.io (SigNoz Inc)

item.title: Third party API Monitoring powered by OpenTelemetry semantics
item.description: Monitor third-party APIs in SigNoz with OpenTelemetry. Track error rates, latency, and request volumes for all your external services, and correlate issues with your application performance.
item.author: hello@signoz.io (SigNoz Inc)

item.title: Traces Without Limits - Load a Million Spans with SigNoz
item.description: SigNoz is now the only distributed tracing tool capable of loading a million spans seamlessly. With our latest improvements, users can navigate, analyze, and debug even the largest traces effortlessly.
item.author: hello@signoz.io (SigNoz Inc)

item.title: Tracing Funnels - Define funnels b/w spans in your distributed systems
item.description: Tracing Funnels in SigNoz introduces the industry’s first product analytics-style funnel analysis for distributed traces, enabling engineers to measure conversion, errors, and latency between key spans across services within a single trace.
item.author: hello@signoz.io (SigNoz Inc)
